content: in next 3 st repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 88 double_crochet 52 double_crochet back-stitch 4 chain-2 corner space 140 total/35 per side these pictures are for stitch demonstration only round 13 c mulberry - large starting in any chain-2 corner space * 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 corner space working in bl double_crochet in each st across to next chain-2 corner space repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join and weave in all yarn ends counts 16 double_crochet 140 bldc 4 chain-2 corner space 156 total/39 per side blocking is a great way to put the finishing touches on your square it allows you to reach your final shape and size it also opens up your stitches making them even and more defined giving it a more professional appearance you can either wet block or steam block but always make sure you are careful when steam blocking acrylic yarn this pattern and all pictures are copyright protected you may only print a copy of this pattern for your use you may sell items made with this pattern but please link back to my website and credit me with the design if you share your finished square link to my website a yarn of serendipity facebook page ribblr love crafts ravelry makerist or creative fabrica do not distribute this pattern or photos in any other form macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 6 of 10 mini square colorway macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 7 of 10 large square colorways macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 8 of 10 macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 9 of 10 front - identification of stitch insert hook into stitch back - location of stitch macey ann square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 10 of 10
